query.prompt:
This text is written in Chinese. Create a word table showing the traditional character and pinyin for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Traditional, Pinyin, Part of Speech, Tense and Note.
* Leave blank if not applicable. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded.
1 在我们人生的中途 9 我将讲述我在那里看到的所有其他事物。 28 当我稍微休息了一下疲惫的身体后， 67 他回答我说：“我不是人，曾经是人，
query.result: |Word|Traditional|Pinyin|Part of Speech|Tense|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---| |在|在|zài|preposition||| |我们|我們|wǒmen|pronoun||| |人生|人生|rénshēng|noun||| |的|的|de|particle||| |中途|中途|zhōngtú|noun||| |我|我|wǒ|pronoun||| |将|將|jiāng|auxiliary verb|future|| |讲述|述說|shùshuō|verb|future|| |我|我|wǒ|pronoun||| |在|在|zài|preposition||| |那里|那裡|nàlǐ|adverb||| |看|看|kàn|verb|present|| |到|到|dào|verb|present|| |的|的|de|particle||| |所有|所有|suǒyǒu|adjective||| |其他|其他|qítā|adjective||| |事物|事物|shìwù|noun||| |当|當|dāng|conjunction||| |我|我|wǒ|pronoun||| |稍微|稍微|shāowéi|adverb||| |休息|休息|xiūxí|verb|past|| |了|了|le|particle|past|| |一下|一下|yīxià|adverb||| |疲惫|疲憊|píbèi|adjective||| |的|的|de|particle||| |身体|身體|shēntǐ|noun||| |后|後|hòu|conjunction||| |他|他|tā|pronoun||| |回答|回答|huídá|verb|past|| |说|說|shuō|verb|past|| |我|我|wǒ|pronoun||| |说|說|shuō|verb|present|| |我|我|wǒ|pronoun||| |不是|不是|bùshì|verb|present|| |人|人|rén|noun||| |曾经|曾經|céngjīng|adverb|past|| |是|是|shì|verb|past|| |人|人|rén|noun|||
